flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=390>>390 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 390*0.1=$<<390*0.1=39.0>>39.0
So his purchase came out to 1400-39.0=$<<1400-39.0=1361.0>>1361.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 390. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
